sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO play_hist ( mem_num, title_id, server_id, play_date, play_ip ) VALUES ( #memNum#, #titleId#, #serverId#, #playDate#, #playIp# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.title_id, t.title_name, t.title_about, t.service_status, t.recruit_status, t.site_url, t.news_url, t.forum_url, t.payment_url, t.big_icon_url, t.small_icon_url, t.order_num, t.players_num, t.announce, p.play_date, p.play_count FROM title_mst t INNER JOIN ( SELECT title_id, MAX(play_date) AS play_date, COUNT(*) AS play_count FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #value# GROUP BY title_id ) p ON t.title_id = p.title_id WHERE t.service_status IN ('0', '1') ORDER BY p.play_date DESC, p.play_count DESC, t.order_num DESC

SELECT t.title_id, t.title_name, t.title_about, t.service_status, t.recruit_status, t.site_url, t.news_url, t.forum_url, t.payment_url, t.big_icon_url, t.small_icon_url, t.order_num, t.players_num, t.announce, p.play_date, p.play_count, c.elect_status FROM title_mst t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT title_id, MAX(play_date) AS play_date, COUNT(*) AS play_count FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #memNum# GROUP BY title_id ) p ON t.title_id = p.title_id LEFT JOIN beta_tester c ON t.title_id = c.title_id AND c.mem_num = #memNum# ORDER BY p.play_date DESC, p.play_count DESC, t.order_num DESC

SELECT s.server_id, s.title_id, s.server_name, s.service_start_date, s.service_status, s.server_domain, s.play_url, s.charge_url, s.order_num, s.players_num, s.popularity_flag, s.recommend_flag, p.play_date, p.play_count FROM server_mst s INNER JOIN ( SELECT server_id, MAX(play_date) AS play_date, COUNT(*) AS play_count FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #memNum# AND title_id = #titleId# GROUP BY server_id ) p ON s.server_id = p.server_id INNER JOIN provider_server_mst ps ON s.title_id = ps.title_id AND s.server_id = ps.server_id WHERE s.title_id=#titleId# AND ps.provider_id = 0 ORDER BY p.play_date DESC, p.play_count DESC, s.order_num DESC

SELECT s.server_id, s.title_id, s.server_name, s.service_start_date, s.service_status, s.server_domain, s.play_url, s.charge_url, s.order_num, s.players_num, s.popularity_flag, s.recommend_flag, p.play_date, p.play_count FROM server_mst s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT server_id, MAX(play_date) AS play_date, COUNT(*) AS play_count FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #memNum# AND title_id = #titleId# GROUP BY server_id ) p ON s.server_id = p.server_id INNER JOIN provider_server_mst ps ON s.title_id = ps.title_id AND s.server_id = ps.server_id WHERE s.title_id=#titleId# AND ps.provider_id = 0 ORDER BY p.play_date DESC, p.play_count DESC, s.order_num DESC
SELECT count(mem_num) FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #memNum# AND title_id = #titleId# AND server_id = #serverId#
SELECT count(distinct(DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y%m%d'))) FROM play_hist WHERE mem_num = #value#

SELECT count(h.mem_num) FROM play_hist h INNER JOIN member_info m ON h.mem_num = m.mem_num WHERE (h.mem_num > #memNum# OR h.mem_num < #memNum# ) AND h.play_date >= DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL #limitDays# DAY) AND h.play_ip = #playIp# AND h.title_id = #titleId# AND h.server_id = #serverId# AND m.mem_atbt_cd IN ('1', '2') AND m.mem_valid_yn_cd IN ('1', '3')
